target.name: run-all-tests
target.description: Call and executes all test cases (targets)

target.name: UserTests
target.description: Call and executes all person test cases (targets)
target.echo: Successfully ran all User JSP tests!

target.name: Login
target.description: Runs login test and verifies Main Menu's Title

target.name: Logout
target.description: Runs logout test and verifies Login's Title

target.name: PasswordHint
target.description: Gets the user's password hint

target.name: EditUser
target.description: Tests selecting the 'Edit Profile' forward

target.name: SearchUser
target.description: Tests search for and displaying all users

target.name: SaveUser
target.description: Tests editing and saving a user

target.name: AddUser
target.description: Adds a new user profile

target.name: ActiveUsers
target.description: View Active Users List

target.name: FlushCache
target.description: opens JSP to Flush Page Cache

target.name: FileUpload
target.description: Tests uploading a file

target.name: ApprovalsScopeTests
target.description: Call and executes all approvalsScope test cases (targets)
target.echo: Successfully ran all ApprovalsScope JSP tests!

target.name: EditApprovalsScope
target.description: Tests editing an existing ApprovalsScope's information

target.name: SaveApprovalsScope
target.description: Tests editing and saving a approvalsScope

target.name: AddApprovalsScope
target.description: Adds a new ApprovalsScope

target.name: DeleteApprovalsScope
target.description: Deletes existing ApprovalsScope

target.name: SearchApprovalsScopes
target.description: Tests search for and displaying all approvalsScopes
